newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Yau Lee unit signs HK$220 mln loan.
newsitem.headline: Yau Lee unit signs HK$220 mln loan.

text.p: Yau Lee Construction Co Ltd signed a revolving credit facility with nine finanical institutions, arranger Banque Nationale de Paris said on Thursday.
The facility, guaranteed by Yau Lee Holdings Ltd, was oversubscribed and increased to HK$220 million from the original HK$150 million, the arranger said.
It has a maturity of 2.5 years and pays a margin of 125 basis points over the Hong Kong Interbank Offered Rate.
Proceeds of the facility will be used to finance the company's working capital for its upcoming construction projects.
Banque Nationale de Paris's Hongkong branch is arranger and agent for the facility.
Banque Francaise du Commerce Exterieur's Hongkong branch, Deutsche Bank's Hongkong branch and Fuji Bank are lead managers.
ABSA Asia, Banco di Napoli SpA's Hongkong branch, Credit Agricole's Hongkong branch, Development Bank of Singapore and Sumitomo Bank's Hongkong branch are managers.
